title: r/Nuclearrevenge They Stole My House, So I Killed 2 of Them!
description:
r/Nuclearrevenge In today's story, a homeowner gets kicked out of his house due to his controlling, evil Homeowner's Association. The former homeowner then carefully plans his revenge, and eventually returns to an HOA meeting with a gun! He kills 2 of the member before he's arrested. It's absolutely insane what steps people will go to get revenge. If you enjoyed this content, be sure to subscribe for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uxXOuBvBBIM
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
